plan.description: Improve incident on-call handoff quality by standardizing incident context capture and displaying the current incident state prominently in the console.
goals: Define a durable incident context model shared across workflows and UI.
Render a consistent incident banner/header in the console based on the context model.
Provide a small, deterministic responder checklist and supporting runbooks.
constraints: No secrets or credentials in the plan inputs.
Prefer generators and existing repo utilities over custom scripts.
Preserve Temporal determinism boundaries (no non-deterministic APIs in workflow bundles).

concerns: Consistency between workflow state and UI
successCriteria: New on-call can assess incident state in under 60 seconds
